meaningMnemonic: You live in the most <kanji>extravagant</kanji> of <kanji>swamp</kanji>s, which means you’re completely surrounded by <vocabulary>luxury</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>extravagant</vocabulary> things.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
